# disableLooping()

**Instance Method**

Disables looping for the player queue.

## Declaration

```swift
func disableLooping()
```

## Discussion

The player looper will stop performing player queue operations for looping and let the current looping item replica play to the end. The player’s original [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayer/actionAtItemEnd-swift.property] property will be restored afterwards.

## Configuring looping

- **loopingPlayerItems**: An array containing replicas of the template player item used to accomplish the looping.
